SELECT YEAR, T1.DAY, F_ISNULL(A,0) A, F_ISNULL(B,0) B, F_ISNULL(C,0) C, F_ISNULL(D,0) D, F_ISNULL(E,0) E, F_ISNULL(F,0) F, F_ISNULL(G,0) G, F_ISNULL(H,0) H, F_ISNULL(I,0) I, F_ISNULL(J,0) J, F_ISNULL(K,0) K, F_ISNULL(L,0) L FROM ( SELECT LPAD(LEVEL, 2, 0) DAY FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (SELECT TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(#findYear#||#findMon#||'01'),'DD') FROM DUAL) ) T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT T1.YEAR, DAY , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='01' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) A , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='02' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) B , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='03' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) C , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='04' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) D , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='05' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) E , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='06' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) F , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='07' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) G , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='08' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) H , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='09' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) I , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='10' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) J , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='11' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) K , F_ISNULL(COUNT(CASE WHEN T1.MON ='12' THEN T1.USER_ID ELSE '' END),0) L FROM BSC_LOG_LIST T1 INNER JOIN V_ROLE_USER T2 ON T1.USER_ID = T2.USER_ID INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING T3 ON T1.YEAR = T3.YEAR AND T2.DEPT_ID = T3.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT T4 ON T1.YEAR = T4.YEAR AND T3.SC_DEPT_ID = T4.SC_DEPT_ID AND T4.SC_DEPT_ID IN ( SELECT SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT WHERE YEAR=T4.YEAR AND DELETE_DT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR SC_DEPT_ID=UP_SC_DEPT_ID AND PRIOR YEAR = YEAR START WITH SC_DEPT_ID=#findScDeptId# ) AND T4.DELETE_DT IS NULL WHERE T1.YEAR=#findYear# AND GBN='L'
T1.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM BSC_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_GUBUN='01')
GROUP BY T1.YEAR, DAY) T2 ON T1.DAY=T2.DAY ORDER BY T1.DAY

SELECT DISTINCT T1.YEAR , MON , T4.SC_DEPT_ID , T4.SC_DEPT_NM , T4.SORT_ORDER , T1.USER_ID , T2.NAME_HAN USER_NM , T2.POS_NM , COUNT(TIME) TIME FROM BSC_LOG_LIST T1 INNER JOIN V_ROLE_USER T2 ON T1.USER_ID=T2.USER_ID INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING T3 ON T1.YEAR=T3.YEAR AND T3.DEPT_ID=T2.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT T4 ON T1.YEAR=T4.YEAR AND T3.SC_DEPT_ID=T4.SC_DEPT_ID AND T4.DELETE_DT IS NULL AND T4.SC_DEPT_ID IN ( SELECT SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT WHERE YEAR=T4.YEAR AND DELETE_DT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR SC_DEPT_ID=UP_SC_DEPT_ID AND PRIOR YEAR=YEAR START WITH SC_DEPT_ID=#findScDeptId# ) WHERE GBN='L' AND T1.YEAR=#findYear# AND MON=#findMon# AND DAY=#findDay#
T1.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM BSC_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_GUBUN='01')
GROUP BY T1.YEAR, MON, T4.SC_DEPT_ID, T4.SC_DEPT_NM, T1.USER_ID, T2.NAME_HAN, T4.SORT_ORDER, T2.POS_NM ORDER BY T1.YEAR, MON, T4.SORT_ORDER, T2.POS_NM

SELECT YEAR, T1.DAY, F_ISNULL(A,0) A FROM ( SELECT LPAD(LEVEL, 2, 0) DAY FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (SELECT TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(#findYear#||#findMon#||'01'),'DD') FROM DUAL) ) T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT T1.YEAR, DAY , F_ISNULL(COUNT(T1.USER_ID),0) A FROM BSC_LOG_LIST T1 INNER JOIN V_ROLE_USER T2 ON T1.USER_ID=T2.USER_ID INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING T3 ON T1.YEAR=T3.YEAR AND T2.DEPT_ID=T3.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT T4 ON T1.YEAR=T4.YEAR AND T3.SC_DEPT_ID=T4.SC_DEPT_ID AND T4.DELETE_DT IS NULL
AND T4.SC_DEPT_ID IN ( SELECT SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT WHERE YEAR=T4.YEAR AND DELETE_DT IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR SC_DEPT_ID=UP_SC_DEPT_ID AND PRIOR YEAR = YEAR START WITH SC_DEPT_ID=#findScDeptId# ) WHERE T1.YEAR=#findYear# AND MON=#findMon# AND GBN='L'
T1.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM BSC_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_GUBUN='01')
GROUP BY T1.YEAR, DAY) T2 ON T1.DAY=T2.DAY ORDER BY T1.DAY
